import React from 'react' import "./sidebar.css" import { RssFeed } from "@material-ui/icons" import { Person } from "@material-ui/icons" import { DeleteForever } from '@material-ui/icons'; import { IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' const Sidebar = () => { const [friendsArr, setFriends] = useState(["", "", "", "", ""]) // Fetch users from dummy server useEffect(() => { const getFriends = async () => { const serverFriends = await fetchFriends() // console.log(serverFriends) setFriends(serverFriends) } getFriends() }) const fetchFriends = async() => { const res = await fetch("https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users") const data = await res.json() return data } return (
